mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Video(channel_id, video_title, video_url, video_description, thumnail_url) VALUES (#{channel_id}, #{video_title}, #{video_url}, #{video_description}, #{thumnail_url})
mapper.select: SELECT c.channel_name, b.board_text, b.upload_date, ch.channel_profile_url, u.user_id, b.board_id, ch.channel_id, ch.channel_description FROM Community_Board b JOIN Channel c ON b.channel_id = c.channel_id JOIN Channel ch ON b.channel_id = ch.channel_id JOIN User u ON ch.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.channel_id = #{channel_id} GROUP BY c.channel_name, b.board_text, b.upload_date, ch.channel_profile_url, u.user_id, b.board_id, ch.channel_id ORDER BY b.board_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Community_Board (channel_id, user_id, board_text) VALUES (#{channel_id}, #{user_id}, #{board_text})
mapper.select: SELECT cb.board_id, cb.board_text, cb.upload_date, c.channel_id, c.channel_name, c.channel_profile_url FROM Community_Board cb JOIN Channel c ON cb.channel_id = c.channel_id WHERE cb.board_id = #{board_id}

SELECT Board.board_id, Board.channel_id, Board.user_id, Board.board_text, COUNT(Like_count.like_id) AS like_count, COUNT(DISTINCT Comment.comment_id) AS comment_count FROM Community_Board Board LEFT JOIN Like_count ON Board.board_id = Like_count.board_id LEFT JOIN Comment ON Board.board_id = Comment.board_id WHERE Board.channel_id = #{channel_id} GROUP BY Board.board_id ORDER BY Board.board_id DESC
